name: claim_sequence
description: order in which claims appear in patent file; sequence for this table begins at {0}.

name: dependent
description: sequence number of claim this is dependent on. NULL if independent

name: claim_number
description: Contains claim number of claim formatted as 0-prefixed 5 digit number. This column will have a range of claims if those claims are cancelled

name: exemplary
description: whether the claim is one of the exemplary claims of the patent; 1 if exemplary claim, 0 otherwise
